TableView.name: vwGetPersonIDToArchive
TableView.userDefinedSQL: SELECT UP.PersonId FROM USMC.Package AS UP WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.PERSON AS MP WITH (NOLOCK) ON UP.SSN = MP.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.vwCurrentNWA AS N WITH (NOLOCK) ON N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = MP.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS AS CS WITH (NOLOCK) ON CS.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID WHERE (CS.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID IN (SELECT MAX(CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID) AS Expr1 FROM MCRISS.dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS AS CS2 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE (NWA_ID = CS.NWA_ID))) AND ((CS.STATUS_TYPE + CS.STATUS_CODE + CS.DISPOSITION_CODE) IN ('ECN', 'ECP')) AND (CS.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE < '2010-10-01')
